Class ByteArrayClassLoader

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--java.lang.ClassLoader
        |
        +--COM.sootNsmoke.scheme.ByteArrayClassLoader
public class ByteArrayClassLoader
extends java.lang.ClassLoader

This is a classloader that is capable of loading up a class from an array of bytes
